episodes_names: Episode 1 - A Walk on the Gourmet Side ~Curiosity Is the Best Bouquet Garni~

Episode 7 - The Prankster Pixie ~Cuore in the Mist~
Episode 8 - A Letter to Join Feelings ~Arancini on the Green Hill~
